thread.title: Rockslide leaves large boulders blocking road in east side of Zion National Park
thread.title_full: Rockslide leaves large boulders blocking road in east side of Zion National Park - Winnipeg Free Press

author: The Associated Press
title: Rockslide leaves large boulders blocking road in east side of Zion National Park
text:
SPRINGDALE, Utah - Officials at southern Utah's Zion National Park have closed a road near the park's east entrance after a rock fall left large boulders blocking the road.
Zion officials say the rockslide occurred on State Route 9, known as the Zion- Mount Carmel Highway, early Wednesday morning.
Park officials did not report any injuries related to the slide.
Crews will have to use heavy machinery and blast the rock to clear the roadway. They expect they will reopen it by Wednesday evening.
The road connects the park's main Zion Canyon with an east entrance.
Park officials say those travelling to the park from the east can take alternative routes around the park to use other entrances.
